lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Justin Bieber/Daniel Caesar/Andrew Wotman/Louis Bell/Luis Manuel Martinez Jr/Bernard Harvey/Giveon Dezmann Evans
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Justin Bieber/Daniel Caesar/Andrew Wotman/Louis Bell/Luis Manuel Martinez Jr/Bernard Harvey/Giveon Dezmann Evans
[00:09.415](Justin Bieber)
[00:09.416]I got my peaches out in Georgia (Oh, yeah, shit)
[00:12.134]I get my weed from California (That’s that shit)
[00:14.823]I took my chick up to the North, yeah (Badass bitch)
[00:17.391]I get my light right from the source, yeah (Yeah, that’s it)
[00:20.145]
[00:20.394](Justin Bieber)
[00:20.395]And I see you (Oh), the way I breathe you in (In)
[00:24.959]It’s the texture of your skin
[00:27.279]I wanna wrap my arms around you, baby
[00:29.293]Never let you go, oh
[00:31.305]And I see you
[00:32.869]There’s nothing like your touch
[00:35.460]It’s the way you lift me up, yeah
[00:39.300]And I’ll be right here with you ’til the end of time
[00:41.320]
[00:41.471](Justin Bieber)
[00:41.472]I got my peaches out in Georgia (Oh, yeah, shit)
[00:44.167]I get my weed from California (That’s that shit)
[00:46.804]I took my chick up to the North, yeah (Badass bitch)
[00:49.472]I get my light right from the source, yeah (Yeah, that’s it)
[00:52.145]
[00:54.047](Daniel Caesar)
[00:54.048]You ain't sure yet. But I'm for ya
[00:58.947]All I could want, all I can wish for
[01:01.912]Nights alone that we wished more
[01:04.222]And days we savin’ souvenirs
[01:07.137]There’s no time, I wanna make more time
[01:10.714]And give you my whole life
[01:13.215]I left my girl, I’m in my YORKER
[01:18.706]Hate to leave her，call it torture
[01:24.125]Remember when I couldn’t hold her
[01:29.444]Left the baggage for RIMOWA
[01:34.127]
[01:34.685](Justin Bieber)
[01:34.686]I got my peaches out in Georgia (Oh, yeah, shit)
[01:37.404]I get my weed from California (That’s that shit)
[01:40.088]I took my chick up to the North, yeah (Badass bitch)
[01:42.660]I get my light right from the source, yeah (Yeah, that’s it)
[01:45.394]
[01:45.542](Giveon)
[01:45.543]I get the feeling, so I’m sure (Sure)
[01:47.854]Hand in my hand because I’m yours
[01:49.794]I can’t, I can’t pretend, I can’t ignore you’re right for me
[01:53.736]Don’t think you wanna know just where I’ve been, oh
[01:57.659]Girl, bein’ distracting
[01:59.705]The one I need is right in my arms (Oh)
[02:02.458]Your kiss is taste the sweetest for mine
[02:04.743]And I’ll be right here with you ’til the end of time
[02:06.823]
[02:06.823](Justin Bieber)
[02:06.824]I got my peaches out in Georgia (Oh, yeah, shit)
[02:09.395]I get my weed from California (That’s that shit)
[02:12.168]I took my chick up to the North, yeah (Badass bitch)
[02:14.788]I get my light right from the source, yeah (Yeah, that’s it)
[02:17.454]I got my peaches out in Georgia (Oh, yeah, shit)
[02:20.148]I get my weed from California (That’s that shit)
[02:22.860]I took my chick up to the North, yeah (Badass bitch)
[02:25.453]I get my light right from the source, yeah (Yeah, that’s it)
[02:28.015]I got my peaches out in Georgia (Oh, yeah, shit)
[02:30.850]I get my weed from California (That’s that shit)
[02:33.526]I took my chick up to the North, yeah (Badass bitch)
[02:36.127]I get my light right from the source, yeah (Yeah, that’s it)

tlyric:
[by:原上巽]
[00:09.415]
[00:09.416]我从乔治亚州带来了我的佳人
[00:12.134]还从加州拿来了我的烟叶
[00:14.823]带着我的女孩回加拿大老家 （我的野蛮女友）
[00:17.391]我的光芒都源自我的魅力本身
[00:20.394]
[00:20.395]我看着你 徐徐将你嗅入我心
[00:24.959]顺着你肌肤的纹理
[00:27.279]我想用双臂环抱住你
[00:29.293]永远不放手
[00:31.305]我看着你
[00:32.869]什么都比不上你的轻抚
[00:35.460]是你成就了我
[00:39.300]我会与你厮守到地老天荒
[00:41.471]
[00:41.472]我从乔治亚州带来了我的佳人
[00:44.167]还从加州拿来了我的烟叶
[00:46.804]带着我的女孩回加拿大老家 （我的野蛮女友）
[00:49.472]我的光芒都源自我的魅力本身
[00:54.047]
[00:54.048]你大可享受一切 但我只衷心于你
[00:58.947]我想要的一切 我所求的一切
[01:01.912]我们许愿有更多独处的夜晚
[01:04.222]更多值得纪念的白天
[01:07.137]时间太少 我想要更多
[01:10.714]想要把我一生都献给你
[01:13.215]我离开的我的女孩 去往我的马洛卡
[01:18.706]不愿离开你 这实在太过煎熬
[01:24.125]还记得我不能拥有她时
[01:29.444]把她的行李都丢在了一旁
[01:34.685]
[01:34.686]我从乔治亚州带来了我的佳人
[01:37.404]还从加州拿来了我的烟叶
[01:40.088]带着我的女孩回加拿大老家 （我的野蛮女友）
[01:42.660]我的光芒都源自我的魅力本身
[01:45.542]
[01:45.543]我确信这份感受
[01:47.854]与你手牵着手 因为我全然属于你
[01:49.794]我无法假装 无法忽视你对我的吸引
[01:53.736]别试探我的过往
[01:57.659]请让我们专注此刻
[01:59.705]我爱的那个人就在我的怀抱
[02:02.458]你的亲吻就是我尝过最甜的蜜
[02:04.743]我会与你厮守到地老天荒
[02:06.823]
